posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD.

Thank you

Hi,

I have a PSA 2 Ty Cobb T205 for sale. It's a very nice card for the grade. There are a couple of wrinkles on the front, but they do not affect Cobb's face. The back is very nice, with all text legible. No glue stains or anything like that. I believe the card received a 2 because the gold border is a bit battered, and the corners are rounded. Otherwise, it's pretty awesome.

Asking $615. Paypal gift, check or money order are all accepted. Price includes priority mail shipping with insurance. 

Here are scans. Click on the small picture below for a large scan:
[URL="http://farm7.staticflickr.com/6119/6363945833_2a292c95c6_b.jpg"][IMG]http://farm7.staticflickr.com/6119/6363945833_2a292c95c6_z.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://farm7.staticflickr.com/6112/6363938837_c97a60a3b5_b.jpg"][IMG]http://farm7.staticflickr.com/6112/6363938837_c97a60a3b5_z.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Thanks for looking!
Peter Baldes
